name: Crypto Gladiator League
public_notice: Crypto Gladiator Shards has been rebranded as Crypto Gladiator League and migrated from OEC to Polygon. For more info, refer to their Medium article.

description.en:
crypto gladiator — connect rpg with blockchain and crypto world

NFT game on chain, play-to-earn with security and transparency
